segments.text: I see the boy reaching into the cookie jar, trying to get as many as he can.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit happy seeing his determination.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl next to him is waiting patiently for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they make a good team, working together like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they know their mom is right there, drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like they're having a little adventure together.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool he's standing on looks quite unstable, but he doesn't seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get caught, it would ruin their fun.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but smile at their teamwork and determination.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they'll be successful in their mission to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR
